name: Joystick.club
description: Joystick.club is a mobile and desktop pay to play to earn arcade platform featuring a growing library of pick up and play gamea, allowing players to earn tokenized rewards. Rewards can be traded on the open market, or cashed in for NFT prizes. Joystick.club is a new economy on an old idea. Charging gamers $0.25 in crypto on the lowest fee chains to play arcade games helps not only build more utility for cryptocurrency, but also showcases the power of microtransactions.
